title: Basefee transactions json do not export accessList field
body:
```
Error: BlockchainTestInFilled convertion error: BlockchainTestBlock convertion error: BasefeeTransaction convertion error: Expected field 'accessList' not found in config: TransactionBaseFee 

{
    "chainId" : "0x01",
    "data" : "",
    "gasLimit" : "0x05f5e100",
    "maxFeePerGas" : "0x07",
    "maxPriorityFeePerGas" : "0x00",
    "nonce" : "0x00",
    "r" : "0x7c5b2515ebc617aef72480ce23ac956736b864bec54a4840de1e93762474449d",
    "s" : "0x5b3afab577636fda93f2c72bf4a4e434b65a9adf2f31e8a88e21d6dc2974bbda",
    "sender" : "0xa94f5374fce5edbc8e2a8697c15331677e6ebf0b",
    "to" : "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000100",
    "type" : "0x02",
    "v" : "0x00",
    "value" : "0x00"
}
```

when filling cancun tests in mcopy tests. 

by definition this transactions must have accessList so the representing json to be implicit have accessList field set to empty
